name: TestGame (Random_Child)
description:
Hey!

I'm glad you're interested in my game!
I'm fairly new to creating games,
and this is my first ever one.

In this visual novel, I've included the many emotions
I've felt in certain moments in my life.
And I really wanted to turn those into something fun!
Around the time I started making this
I was dealing with some thoughts,
so I just want to give a trigger warning here.

This game may include:
Anger
Mentions of Depression
and a few Phobias.

Warnings will be provided at these parts.





This game is under development.





I'm still kind of learning how to use Ren'py.
Make sure to correct anything!
